sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' function PokeCard({pokemonData}) { const colors = { fire: '#d82b34', fairy: '#fceaff', bug: '#f8d5a3', psychic: '#eaeda1', grass: '#1ad148', electric: '#FCF7DE', water: '#DEF3FD', poison: '#837ad6', ground: '#f4e7da', rock: '#d5d5d4', normal: '#F5F5F5', dragon: '#97b3e6', flying: '#30aae2', fighting: '#E6E0D4', steel: '#979595', ice: '#6eb8e9' } const main_types = Object.keys(colors) const ability1 = pokemonData.abilities[0].ability.name[0].toUpperCase() + pokemonData.abilities[0].ability.name.slice(1) const ability2 = pokemonData.abilities[1].ability.name[0].toUpperCase() + pokemonData.abilities[1].ability.name.slice(1) return (
#{pokemonData.id}

{pokemonData.name}

Type: {type}, {type2}

Ability 1: {ability1}

Ability 2: {ability2}

Hit Points: {pokemonData.stats[0].base_stat}

{pokemonData.stats[0].base_stat}

Attack: {pokemonData.stats[1].base_stat}

{pokemonData.stats[1].base_stat}

Defense: {pokemonData.stats[2].base_stat}

{pokemonData.stats[2].base_stat}

Special-Attack: {pokemonData.stats[3].base_stat}

{pokemonData.stats[3].base_stat}

Special-Defense: {pokemonData.stats[4].base_stat}

{pokemonData.stats[4].base_stat}

Speed: {pokemonData.stats[5].base_stat}

{pokemonData.stats[5].base_stat}
); } export default PokeCard;
